components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Invoice Bulk Download Failure in Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue in Twilio Console. Invoices created before 2023-08 are not being downloaded using bulk downloader feature from console. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue in Twilio Console. Invoices created before 2023-08 are not being downloaded using bulk downloader feature from console. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Tigo Network in Honduras

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Tigo Network in Honduras. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The Orange network in Mali is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 February 2025 at 15:00 PST until 05 February 2025 at 21:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Orange Mali handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Thailand Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Thailand is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 February 2025 at 17:30 PST until 05 February 2025 at 18:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Thailand phone numbers.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, APAC

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS/MMS Maintenance Activity

incident_updates.body: Twilio will be performing a planned maintenance activity from 05 February, 2025  at 20:00 PST until 06 February, 2025 at 00:00 PST. During the Maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada Network Subscribers over a subset of Toll-Free, Long Code and Short Code Numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: TaskRouter scheduled maintenance

incident_updates.body:
We will be performing a brief TaskRouter database update in the US1 region, specifically adding a new column to an existing table. This update is expected to be completed in less than a minute and should not affect your service.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system's performance during and after the update to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency Plan: In the unlikely event of any issues, we are prepared to revert the changes immediately.

affected_components.name: FLEX - TaskRouter
